name: Grainfruit Chips
effect:
Restores 18–22% of Max HP to the selected character.
Regenerates 300–470 HP every 5s for the next 30s.
description: Crispy triangular chips. After being scooped out of the oil-filled pot, the deep-fried chips are drizzled with sauce, sprinkled with cheese, and finally topped with shredded meat — thus is a hearty Natlan breakfast born.

suspicious.effect: Restores 18% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.
suspicious.description: Crispy triangular chips. The oily, crunchy pieces collide with sickly sticky cheese to create a greasy texture that can only be stomached once, but never again.

normal.effect: Restores 20% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 390 HP every 5s for 30s.
normal.description: Crispy triangular chips. After being scooped out of the oil-filled pot, the deep-fried chips are drizzled with sauce, sprinkled with cheese, and finally topped with shredded meat — thus is a hearty Natlan breakfast born.

delicious.effect: Restores 22% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 470 HP every 5s for 30s.
delicious.description: Crispy triangular chips. Crunch-crunch-crunch go the crispy pieces! You simply cannot stop pairing it with the sweet and sour sauce, the rich, fragrant cheese, the delicious shredded meat... Why does this combination have to. Be. So. Delicious?
